mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(id, name, address, phone, email, fax, contacts, createDate, remark, status) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{fax}, #{contacts}, #{createDate}, #{remark}, #{status})
mapper.update: update t_customer set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, fax = #{fax}, contacts = #{contacts}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
